metadata.name: Copy From Or To Admin Share Or Sysvol Folder
metadata.comment: Detects a copy command or a copy utility execution to or from an Admin share or remote

batch.sql: SELECT * FROM process_activity WHERE time BETWEEN CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() - INTERVAL 24 HOUR AND CURRENT_TIMESTAMP() AND (lower(activity_id) = lower('1') AND (lower(process.cmd_line) regexp '.*\\.*$.*' OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('\\sysvol\\'))) AND ((endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\robocopy.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\xcopy.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('robocopy\.exe', 'xcopy\.exe')) OR endswith(lower(process.name), lower('\\cmd.exe')) AND lower(process.file.name) = lower('cmd.exe') AND contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('copy')) OR (contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\powershell.exe')) OR contains(lower(process.name), lower('\\pwsh.exe'))) AND (lower(LOWER(process.file.name)) in ('powershell\.exe', 'pwsh\.dll')) AND (contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('copy-item')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('copy ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('cpi ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' cp ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('move ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower('move-item')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' mi ')) OR contains(lower(process.cmd_line), lower(' mv ')))))

output.summary: Detects a copy command or a copy utility execution to or from an Admin share or remote
